directions: In a salad bowl, combine the chick peas, celery, onion, apple or grapes and chopped nuts.
Prepare the dressing by whisking together the mayonnaise, honey, mustard and lemon juice.
Combine the salad mixture and dressing. Toss and serve on a bed of shredded lettuce.
ingredients: 1/2 head iceberg lettuce - rinsed, dried, and shredded
title: Garbanzo Bean Salad
